#summary Installation of all needed tool to allow develop this project.

= Starfire Installation =
  == Install Java JDK6 ==
    === Windows: ===
      # Download and install Java JDK 6: [http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html JDK6]
      # Set 'JAVA_HOME' environment variable to point to installation directory. _For example: 'C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_25'._
      # Add '%JAVA_HOME%\bin' to 'path' environment variable.
    === Ubuntu: ===
      # Uninstall Open JDK if it's installed in your system.
      # Download and install Java JDK 6: [http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html JDK6]
      # Add this location to the path by modifying '.bashrc' file located in your home folder. For example, the following lines could be added to '.bashrc' file:
{{{
export JAVA_HOME=/home/username/Descargas/JAVA/jdk1.6.0_23
export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH
}}}
  == Install Maven ==
    === Windows: ===
      # Download the last version of Maven2 .zip from [http://maven.apache.org/download.html#Maven_2.2.1 Maven_2.2.1].
      # Unzip it in the location where you want to have it installed.
      # Modify the path by adding the location of the bin directory located inside the unzipped folder. _For example: C:\Program Files\apache-maven-2.2.1\bin._
      # Test Maven2 runs correctly by writing 'mvn' in the console.
    === Ubuntu: ===
      Go to Synaptics Package Manager and install _Maven2_.

  == Install Eclipse and proper plugins ==
      # Download and install Eclipse Classic: [http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/ Eclipse]
      # Set in .ini file in eclipse folder, the launching option
    {{{
    -vm
    C:/...path_to_java_jdk.../bin
    }}}
      # Install *Subclipse_1.4* plugin: [http://subclipse.tigris.org/ Subclipse_1.4]
      # Install *m2eclipse* plugin: [http://m2eclipse.sonatype.org/installing-m2eclipse.html m2eclipse]

  == Prepare the project and install dependencies: ==
      # Download this project from svn.
      # Run 'Installer.java' class located in {{{installer}}} package. _Note: Maybe it's needed to comment all dependencies in 'pom.xml' file to allow compilation. Uncomment them after running 'Installer.java'._
      # Execute 'Maven Install' over the whole project.

  == Install Jpcap ==
      # Download WinPcap: [http://www.winpcap.org/install/default.htm WinPcap].
      # Download Jpcap 0.7: [http://netresearch.ics.uci.edu/kfujii/Jpcap/doc/download.html Jpcap_0.7]. _Note: *x32 achictecture needed*._
